com.star.report

类 JUnitXMLReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.star.report.AbstractReporter
      • com.star.report.JUnitXMLReporter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.testng.IReporter, org.testng.ITestNGListener

    public class JUnitXMLReporter
extends AbstractReporter
    JUnit XML reporter for TestNG that uses Velocity templates to generate its output.
    作者:
    Daniel Dyer

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  JUnitXMLReporter.TestClassResults
      Groups together all of the data about the tests results from the methods of a single test class.

    • 方法详细资料

      • generateReport

        public void generateReport(java.util.List<org.testng.xml.XmlSuite> xmlSuites,
                  java.util.List<org.testng.ISuite> suites,
                  java.lang.String outputDirectoryName)
        Generates a set of XML files (JUnit format) that contain data about the outcome of the specified test suites.
        参数:
        suites - Data about the test runs.
        outputDirectoryName - The directory in which to create the report.

      • flattenResults

        private java.util.Collection<JUnitXMLReporter.TestClassResults> flattenResults(java.util.List<org.testng.ISuite> suites)
        Flatten a list of test suite results into a collection of results grouped by test class. This method basically strips away the TestNG way of organising tests and arranges the results by test class.

      • organiseByClass

        private void organiseByClass(java.util.Set<org.testng.ITestResult> testResults,
                   java.util.Map<org.testng.IClass,JUnitXMLReporter.TestClassResults> flattenedResults)

      • getResultsForClass

        private JUnitXMLReporter.TestClassResults getResultsForClass(java.util.Map<org.testng.IClass,JUnitXMLReporter.TestClassResults> flattenedResults,
                                                   org.testng.ITestResult testResult)
        Look-up the results data for a particular test class.
